display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Soldiers of Arachnos and may be slotted into any Arachnos Soldier or Arachnos Widow damage power.
